name: immune system cancer
definition: An organ system cancer located_in the immune system that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation in organs of the immune system. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Immune_system]

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a Phase II trial, treatment with Afuresertib (GSK2110183) in patients with Langerhans cell histiocytosis resulted in an overall response rate of 33% in treatment-naive patients and 28% in patients with refractory disease (PMID: 27804235).

references.title: A phase IIa study of afuresertib, an oral pan-AKT inhibitor, in patients with Langerhans cell histiocytosis.
